Drops.How and Where to Obtain:
Planters can sometimes drop tickets, the quantity of the tickets depend on the type of the Planter.
The Ticket Planter exclusively drops tickets as a bonus drop, ranging between 10 and 150.

The Candy Planter drops Gumdrops as a bonus drop.
Placing the Candy Planter in Blue Flower Field, Strawberry Field, or Pineapple Patch makes it drop more gumdrops.
Planters in Stump Field can drop Gumdrops.
The Planter Of Plenty drops Gumdrops as a bonus drop and has a rare chance to drop 100 gumdrops.
Planters in the 35 Bee Zone can drop Coconuts.

Planting the Blue Clay Planter in the Spider Field guarantees at least 10 Micro-Converters.
The Planter Of Plenty drops Micro-Converters as a bonus drop.

Fully growing the Red Clay Planter in the Clover Field, Spider Field and Cactus Field consecutively rewards 10 stingers (2 weeks cooldown).
Planters grown in the Cactus Field and Rose Field have a chance to drop stingers.
The Heat-Treated Planter drops 10 Stingers when fully grown in Cactus Field.
Planters in the Pine Tree Forest can drop whirligigs.
The Tacky Planter and Petal Planter drop Field Dice as bonus drop.
The Tacky Planter and Petal Planters drop Smooth Dice as bonus drop.

The Tacky Planter has a rare chance to drop Loaded Dice.
Planting the Tacky Planter in the Mountain Top Field makes it drop 1 or 2 Loaded Dice (1 month cooldown).
The Petal Planter has an approximately 20% chance to drop Loaded Dice.
Planting the Heat-Treated Planter in the Mushroom Field guarantees 1 Loaded Dice with a cooldown of around 22 hours.
Planting the Hydroponic Planter in the Blue Flower Field guarantees 1 Loaded Dice with a cooldown of around 22 hours.
The Candy Planter, Petal Planter, and The Planter Of Plenty drop Jelly Beans as bonus drop.

The Red Clay Planter has a rare chance to drop 10 Red Extracts.
Placing the Heat-Treated Planter in the Mushroom Field, the Strawberry Field, the Rose Field, or the Pepper Patch has a rare chance to drop 100 Red Extracts (unknown cooldown).
Placing the Heat-Treated Planter in the Mushroom Field, the Strawberry Field, the Rose Field, and the Pepper Patch consecutively guarantees a bonus of an additional 100 Red Extracts (1 month cooldown).
The Red Clay Planter and Heat-Treated Planter drop Red Extracts as a bonus drop.

Planting the Hydroponic Planter in the Blue Flower Field, the Bamboo Field, the Pine Tree Forest, and the Stump Field consecutively guarantees a bonus of an additional 100 Blue Extracts (1 month cooldown).
The Hydroponic Planter drops Blue Extracts as a bonus drop.

The Petal Planter drops 10 Glitter in Dandelion Field (Unknown cooldown).
The Petal Planter drops glitter as a bonus drop.

Planting the Candy Planter in the Stump Field 3 times in a row will guarantee 10 glue (1 week cooldown).
The Candy Planter has an uncommon chance to drop glue, and a very rare chance to drop 10 glue on its own.

Planters in Sunflower Field have a chance to drop Oil.
Paper Planters are guaranteed to drop 1 or 5 Oils in the Sunflower Field.
The Hydroponic Planter drops Oil as a bonus drop.
Planting the Hydroponic Planter 3 times in a row in the Sunflower Field guarantees 100 Oils. (unknown cooldown)

Planting the Heat-Treated Planter in the Pineapple Patch 3 times in a row guarantees an bonus 100 Enzymes (unknown cooldown).
Planting the Heat-Treated Planter in the Pepper Patch can rarely result in a bonus of 100 Enzymes.
Heat-Treated Planters exclusively drop enzymes as a bonus drop.
Placing a planter in Pineapple Patch gives the planter a rare chance to drop enzymes.
Planters in Coconut Field have a rare chance to drop Tropical Drinks.
Planting Red Clay Planters or Tacky Planter in a red field then a blue field or vice versa gives it a chance to drop a Purple Potion.

Plastic Planters has an uncommon chance to drop 1 Super Smoothie when harvested with 1 month cooldown.
Candy Planters has a rare chance to drop 1-3 Super Smoothies.
Planting Planters Of Plenty in the Bamboo Field makes it drop 10 Super Smoothies (1 month cooldown).
The Petal Planter has an approximately 2% chance to drop a Super Smoothie.

Planting the Petal Planter in any white field makes it drop 10 Star Jelly (unknown cooldown).
The Petal Planter drops Star Jelly as a bonus drop.
The Planter Of Plenty drops Star Jelly as a bonus drop.

Placing any planters in Sunflower Field makes it drop sunflower seeds.
The Tacky Planter exclusively drops sunflower seeds as a bonus drop.

Placing any planter in Red Fields makes them drop Strawberries.
The Heat-Treated Planter drops extra strawberries when planted in the Strawberry Field.
Placing any planter in Pineapple Patch makes them drop pineapples.
Placing any planter in Blue Fields makes them drop Blueberries.

Placing the Pesticide Planter in the Pepper Patch, Spider Field, or the Mountain Top Field has a chance of dropping 100 bitterberries.
Placing any planter in Pepper Patch or Spider Field makes them drop Bitterberries.

Fully harvesting Pesticide Planters in the Stump Field, the Mountain Top Field, and the Coconut Field (in that order) results in at least 25 Neonberries (1 week cooldown).
The Planter Of Plenty and the Pesticide Planter drops Neonberries as a bonus drop. The Planter Of Plenty has a rare chance of dropping 100 Neonberries.
Placing any planter in Pineapple Patch makes them drop Moon Charm, the amount of Moon Charms depends on the type of planter.

Red Clay Planters drops waxes as a bonus drop, including Soft Wax.
Planters Of Plenty drops waxes as a bonus drop, including Soft Wax.
Planting any planter in Mushroom Field gives them a chance to drop Soft Wax.

Red Clay Planters has an uncommon chance to drop Hard Wax.
Planters Of Plenty drops Hard Wax as a bonus drop.

Harvesting a fully grown Plastic Planter in the Coconut Field makes it drop 1 Swirled Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Candy Planter in Cactus Field guarantees 1 Swirled Wax (36 day cooldown)
Planting the Red Clay Planter in Sunflower Field makes it drop 1 Swirled Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Red Clay Planter in blue fields has a chance to drop a Swirled Wax.
Planting the Blue Clay Planter in Spider Field makes it drop 1 Swirled Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Tacky Planter in the Pumpkin Patch makes it drop 1 Swirled Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Pesticide Planter in the Strawberry Field guarantees 1 Swirled Wax (36 day cooldown).
Planting the Heat-Treated Planter in the Blue Flower Field guarantees 1 Swirled Wax if fully harvested (36 day cooldown).
Planting the Hydroponic Planters in the Mushroom Field guarantees 1 Swirled Wax if fully harvested (36 day cooldown).
Planting the Petal Planter in the Strawberry Field makes it drop 1 Swirled Wax (1 month cooldown).
The Planter Of Plenty has an uncommon chance to drop 5 Swirled Wax.
The Planter Of Plenty has an uncommon chance to drop 1 Swirled Wax.

Harvesting a fully grown Plastic Planter in the Rose Field makes it drop 1 Caustic Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Candy Planter in Mountain Top Field guarantees 1 Caustic Wax (36 day cooldown).
Planting the Red Clay Planter in Clover Field makes it drop 1 Caustic Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Blue Clay Planter in Clover Field makes it drop 1 Caustic Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Tacky Planter in Bamboo Field makes it drop 1 Caustic Wax (1 month cooldown).
Planting the Pesticide Planter in the Strawberry Field or the Bamboo Field has higher chances of dropping a Caustic Wax.
Planting the Heat-Treated Planter in the Coconut Field guarantees 1 Caustic Wax if fully grown(36 day cooldown).
Planting the Hydroponic Planter in the Coconut Field guarantees 1 Caustic Wax if fully grown(36 day cooldown).
Planting thePetal Planter in the Dandelion Field makes it drop 1 Caustic Wax (1 month cooldown).
The Planter Of Plenty has a rare chance to drop 1 Caustic Wax.

Almost every planter has a chance to drop Turpentine.
The Planter Of Plenty has 10% chance.
The Petal Planter has an approximately >1% chance.

Sticker Planters always guarantee stickers.
Certain planters drops certain stickers exclusive to them.
